```{sql connection=con, output.var='purpose_of_hearing'}
select a.cino, b.purpose from case_details as a left join case_history as b ON a.cino=b.cino where a.case_flag = '1'
```

To share, removing the cino and removing duplicates from purpose so shorten the file

```{r}
purpose_of_hearing$cino <- NULL
purpose_df <- data.frame(purpose_of_hearing=unique(purpose_of_hearing$purpose))

write_csv(purpose_df, 'datasets/to_standardise/purpose_of_hearing.csv')
```
